entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is worried about Voldemort finding out he's at a safe house.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, who Harry is worried will find out he's at a safe house.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: A member of the Weasley family and one of the people trying to protect Harry.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: The wife of Mr. Weasley and a member of the Weasley family.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts and a friend of Harry's.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: A member of the Weasley family who is getting married to Bill Weasley.

relationships.description: Harry is worried that Voldemort will find out he's at a safe house.
Mr. Weasley and his family are trying to protect Harry from Voldemort.
Mrs. Weasley is caring for Harry and trying to make him feel better.
Hagrid is also protecting Harry from Voldemort.
Fleur is getting married to Bill Weasley, but this relationship is not directly related to the main plot of the story.
